CHAT.comment: CHI and MIT are looking out of the window in CHI's room .
CHI and MIT are in the living room
CHI and MIT are at another table. There are crayons and scrap paper on it

u.a: points at a car parked outside
turns the dial of the phone several times
steps on the toy to look out of the window
lifts CHI up in the air
points at the swimming pool in the complex
turns CHI around and walks him to the living room
gets up and brings back a toy elephant from the other side of the room
this toy (Osooji zoo-san = cleaning elephant) has a roller that sweeps in small paper-made objects, such as bananas and pencils
points at the elephant in the book
opens the back of the elephant and takes out a banana
points at three other pieces that go with the elephant toy
points at the piece CHI has
points at Doraemon (= a cartoon character)
points at a picture of fire fighters
runs his finger on the water coming out of the hose
points at Anpanman (= a cartoon character)
<aft> walks to the middle of the room and picks up another paper object for the toy elephant
comes back with the paper object
points at two other objects on the floor
puts the objects on a toy train
places another object on the train
passes the object that fell off the train to MIT
rolls the toy elephant over the small objects
opens the elephant's back and takes out the paper pieces
moves Osooji zoo-san over the small objects
picks up lint from the carpet and hands it to MIT
points at a small piece on the floor
opens the elephant, takes out a banana piece and hands it to MIT
gives MIT the rest of the objects
lines up the pieces on the floor
holds the elephant and moves it over the paper pieces
opens the elephants back and takes out the pieces
lines up the pieces and hands the elephant to CHI
moves the elephant over the pieces
points at a piece on the floor
tries to move the elephant backwards
moves the pieces in front of the elephant
turns the elephant and moves it backwards
moves the pieces in front of the elephant again
squeezes the objects in the elephant's body from the bottom
moves the toy over the small objects
puts some of the objects in front of the elephant
approaches the tape recorder and points at it
points at a Japanese alphabet poster on the wall
runs to the poster and points at a picture of eyeglasses
runs to another poster of Japanese characters with pictures
points at a picture of a TV set
vaguely points at the TV cabinet in the room
runs to the tape recorder and points at it
draws a square in the air
points at the picture of TV on the poster again
sits down in front of the Doodle Table
stamps a triangle on the board
takes a writing tool with a ball
hides the square stamp under the Doodle Table
moves the table and sees the stamp
hides another stamp while CHI is drawing
returns the table back to its original position
hides a different stamp under the table
shows CHI a writing tool that looks like a fat crayon
hides the crayon under the table
opens the lid of a toy case behind CHI and looks inside
returns the table back in position
gives MIT the crayon shaped writing tool
stamps a triangle on the car
gives the crayon back to MIT
takes out a plastic building block
presses the block against the surface of the table
hides the block under the table
stamps the block on the table
lifts the table and moves it in the air
points at a picture of a frog on the poster
points at an apple on the poster
climbs on the slide to reach the top part of the poster
points at a picture of crayons
points to the other side of the room
walks to a table with crayons
takes all the crayons out of the container
colors the windows of the car
points at a figure in the car
paints the car in a different color
points at drawings by himself taped on the window
points at a drawing of a pumpkin
points a drawing of a face
returns to the crayons and paper
